dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A credit score, it's like a financial passport, right? And now, the First Credit Bureau of Kazakhstan is handing them out in Moldova.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A credit score, it's like a financial passport, right? And now, the First Credit Bureau of Kazakhstan is handing them out in Moldova.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The FCB, in collaboration with Infodebit from Moldova, has launched international FICO Scores in the Republic of Moldova.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. So FCB, they've partnered with InfoCredit from Romania to launch FICO Scores there. That's a huge step for lending in that region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. So F C B, they've partnered with InfoCredit from Romania to launch F I C O Scores there. That's a huge step for lending in that region.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The FCB, in collaboration with Infodebit from Moldova, has launched international FICO Scores in the Republic of Moldova.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and it's not just for banks—telecom operators, micro-finance orgs, all kinds of lenders can use these scores for decisions on loans and monitoring.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and it's not just for banks-telecom operators, micro-finance orgs, all kinds of lenders can use these scores for decisions on loans and monitoring.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now banks, micro-finance organizations, telecom operators, and other lenders in Moldova can also use FICO Scores in their decision-making processes with regards to issuing loans, portfolio monitoring, issuing fast loans, and new products.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And I noticed they got approval from Moldova's Data Protection Agency, which is a good sign—means it meets GDPR standards, so data privacy is built in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And I noticed they got approval from Moldova's Data Protection Agency, which is a good sign-means it meets G D P R standards, so data privacy is built in.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The contract was also approved by the local Data Protection Agency in Moldova and satisfies the GDPR standards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's crucial, especially when you're dealing with sensitive financial info. Ruslan Omarov from FCB mentioned they're combining their own expertise with global best practices.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's crucial, especially when you're dealing with sensitive financial info. Ruslan Omarov from F C B mentioned they're combining their own expertise with global best practices.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ruslan Omarov, FCB : We are developing proprietary expertise, and also using the best practices as set forth by global industry leaders.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, and he said that using bureau solutions alongside their own tools has multiplied the efficiency of credit organizations several times over.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, and he said that using bureau solutions alongside their own tools has multiplied the efficiency of credit organizations several times over.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By using the bureau's solutions in conjunction with our own cards, the quality of decision-making and the efficiency of credit organizations have increased several times over.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting—FCB has actually been a FICO provider since 2013, so they've got a solid track record in Central Asia, like Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting-F C B has actually been a F I C O provider since twenty thirteen, so they've got a solid track record in Central Asia, like Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: FCB has been an official FICO provider since 2014 and has a license to distribute and sell FICO Scores, including in countries such as Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Moldova, as well as a number of Central Asian countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And now they're expanding further. John Hadlow from FICO called FCB an important regional partner, really valuing their data quality and experience.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And now they're expanding further. John Hadlow from F I C O called F C B an important regional partner, really valuing their data quality and experience.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: John Hadlow, Senior Consultant at FICO said: The First Credit Bureau of Kazakhstan is an important regional partner for us. We highly value FCB's experience and data quality, which helps us to maintain and deliver high quality analytics to FCB for our mutual customers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You know, FICO Scores have been around for over 30 years—they basically democratized credit access in the U.S. by giving lenders an unbiased risk tool.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, F I C O Scores have been around for over thirty years-they basically democratized credit access in the U.S. by giving lenders an unbiased risk tool.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than 30 years ago, the FICO Score helped democratize access to credit in the United States by providing an unbiased credit risk assessment tool for lenders.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's wild to think how that model is now helping promote financial inclusion in totally different parts of the world, like Moldova and beyond.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's wild to think how that model is now helping promote financial inclusion in totally different parts of the world, like Moldova and beyond.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together we can empower lenders across the region with world class decisioning analytics, helping them grow even faster whilst promoting financial inclusion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And FCB's use of machine learning and predictive analytics means they can offer consulting way beyond their home country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And F C B's use of machine learning and predictive analytics means they can offer consulting way beyond their home country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The best expertise of the FCB in Kazakhstan in the field of predictive analytics, as well as the use of machine learning tools, allows it to expand the boundaries of consulting far beyond the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They're even planning infrastructure projects starting in 2024 to improve lending quality in other countries too. It feels like a real regional game-changer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're even planning infrastructure projects starting in twenty twenty four to improve lending quality in other countries too. It feels like a real regional game-changer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Partnering with bureaus in over 30 countries, FICO's really extending its reach—from the U.S. to Europe, the Middle East, now deeper into Central Asia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Partnering with bureaus in over thirty countries, F I C O's really extending its reach-from the U.S. to Europe, the Middle East, now deeper into Central Asia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: FICO works with many credit bureaus around the world, with experience in over 30 countries, including in the USA, Turkey, Russia, Israel, and in Europe, and the Middle East.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's all about empowering lenders with world-class analytics, helping them grow faster and include more people in formal financial systems.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's all about empowering lenders with world-class analytics, helping them grow faster and include more people in formal financial systems.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together we can empower lenders across the region with world class decisioning analytics, helping them grow even faster whilst promoting financial inclusion.

HostA: Right, and it's not just for banks—telecom operators, micro-finance orgs, all kinds of lenders can use these scores for decisions on loans and monitoring.
HostB: And I noticed they got approval from Moldova’s Data Protection Agency, which is a good sign—means it meets GDPR standards, so data privacy is built in.
HostA: That’s crucial, especially when you're dealing with sensitive financial info. Ruslan Omarov from FCB mentioned they're combining their own expertise with global best practices.
HostB: Mhm, and he said that using bureau solutions alongside their own tools has multiplied the efficiency of credit organizations several times over.
HostA: It’s interesting—FCB has actually been a FICO provider since 2013, so they've got a solid track record in Central Asia, like Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan.
HostB: And now they're expanding further. John Hadlow from FICO called FCB an important regional partner, really valuing their data quality and experience.
HostA: You know, FICO Scores have been around for over 30 years—they basically democratized credit access in the U.S. by giving lenders an unbiased risk tool.
HostB: It’s wild to think how that model is now helping promote financial inclusion in totally different parts of the world, like Moldova and beyond.
